column4: i have ethernet connection connected to ubuntu, but when i do ifconfig, it doesnt recognise it

do sudo ifconfig -a       do you see the interface ?
ok - so ubuntu can see the card. Use the system --> admin ---> networking gui to set an ip
ok - so your network card is fine
we have looked at this and it DOES recognise it
because you've not set your card up with the correct ip / dns / route ?
